spec_data.Name: yum-plugin-refresh-updatesd
spec_data.Description:
yum-refresh-updatesd tells yum-updatesd to check for updates when yum exits.
This way, if you run 'yum update' and install all available updates, puplet
will almost instantly update itself to reflect this.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 09:02:56 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Tell yum-updatesd to check for updates when yum exits
